title: Forced to Marry the Cold Snake King - Novel Updates
genre: Gender Bender   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Arranged Marriage   Cultivation   Forced Marriage   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Mpreg   Transmigration
author: 茶茶花開
description: Su Yuan dressed as a woman, he was forced by the tribe to disguise himself as a woman, instead of his genius sister as a gift for the devil. Rumor has it that the demon is ugly, cruel, raw man-eating, and is a cold snake demon.  Su Yuan trembling in the sedan chair.  Pei Ying, he is most afraid of snakes.  No, he can’t sit still, he must find a way to escape.  Three years later… Looking at the little cubs holding his legs on the ground and the snake eggs in his hands, Su Yuan wanted to cry without tears. These two were born to him and were born with the devil.  In short, this is a story of a small cannon fodder trying to escape, and finally being favored by the big snake king..>
